segments.text: yes . It was so crowded . I'm worn-out . Let's find our seats .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: are they window seats or aisle seats ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: let me see ... yes , one window seat and one aisle seat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ok . But can I trade my seat with you ? I prefer the one near the window . I'm a terrible flyer . I always get airsick and can never relax until after I've landed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: that's fine . I'd like to be on the aisle anyway . It's easier to get in and out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: thanks . Where shall we put our luggage ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think the smaller carry-on bag can go in the overhead compartment , and the others can go under the seat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: don't forget to keep the seat belt on .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ok . Hope it's a pleasant trip .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: oh , you have too wild of an imagination .
segments.speaker: S2
